    • Constructor Detail

      • Square

        public Square(Point point,
              int width,
              java.awt.Color color,
              int thickness,
              boolean isFill)
        Construct a square with a corner point, and a width. Set its color, thickness and if the square is filled or not.
        Parameters:
        point - (a Point object) consisting of X and Y coordinates. This is the top left corner of the square.
        width - (a int value) the width of the square
        color - (a color object) the color of the the square
        thickness - (a non-negative integer) This determines the thickness of the border of the square
        isFill - (a boolean) determines whether to fill the square with the chosen color

    • Method Detail

      • getPoint

        public Point getPoint()
        Returns:
        (A point object) the top left point of the square

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Returns:
        (an int) return the width of the square

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth(int nWidth)
        Parameters:
        nWidth - (an integer) set the width for the square to the given value

      • setQuadrant

        public void setQuadrant(Point last)
        Parameters:
        last - (a Point object) the point(last) that, relative to this rectangles point, dictates what quadrant this rectangle will be built in.

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
        This method paints the square based on it's quadrant
        Specified by:
        paint in class Shape
        Parameters:
        g2d - the Graphics2D object used to make graphics.
